12: next          n      >     go to next build/slide
13: previous      p      <     go back to previous build/slide
14: Next          N      >>    go to next slide
15: Previous      P      <<    go back to previous slide
16: i next        i n          advance i slides
17: i previous    i p          go back i slides
18: i go          i g          go to slide i
19: first         f      |<    go to first slide
20: last          l      >|    go to last slide
21: Last          L      >>|   go to last build of last slide
22: run           r      !!    execute code that appears on slide
24: help          h      ?     print this help message
